name: colourjump2
description:
Sad story about life as a process.
Do not touch the screen to jump. Touch to fall. Every board you meet will change your appearance and game rules.

Source code is available on Github: www.github.com/fiddenmar/colourjump2

Music: www.bensound.com
Made with HaxeFlixel: www.haxeflixel.com

You can write me an email: fiddenmarATgmailDOTcom

Controls:

  • Windows/Linux:
    • Menu
      • Down and Up arrows to switch menu options
      • Enter to enter
    • Game
      • Down arrow or Space to fall
  • Android:
    • Menu
      • Touch under or over menu text to switch
      • Touch text to enter
    • Game
      • Touch anywhere to fall

Thank you for playing
